name: English
aboutCourse:
This course allows trainees to have experience teaching secondary English in two school locations.  There are two placements that run from Sept-Dec and Jan-June.  Our placement schools are based in Gloucestershire within a short drive from Cleeve.

Throughout the course, training will be held at Cleeve training hub on Fridays.
interviewProcess: On interview, candidates will be required to teach a 25 minute teaching episode or 'micro lesson' with a small group of Key Stage 3 students.  This is followed by a panel interview with representatives from the school and University of Gloucestershire
howSchoolPlacementsWork: There are two placements that run from Sept-Dec and Jan-June.  Our partnership secondary schools teach from 11 onwards, and we ensure that all trainees have the opportunity to teach KS3-KS5 over the course of the academic year,
personalQualities: We are looking for enthusiastic trainees with a passion for working with young people and to give them the very best opportunities.  Effective trainees are reflective and work well in teams .
